original_title: Another couple arrested for damaging Lotus Tower
original_body_lines: Despite several warnings and notices, another group of young adults were caught causing damages to the observation deck at the Lotus Tower, Colombo today, its management said.
The management had taken action by informing the Maradana Police Station and the accused individuals were summoned to the Police Station.
The Lotus Tower management said that even after awareness raising messages over the media it is pathetic that such incidents take place.

"It is our duty to safeguard and protect this public asset. However, there has been an increase in the number of individuals who damage the walls and iron fences of the Lotus Tower," the management said. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
